About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Well, I'm a pianist with a passion for web development. I got into coding a couple of years ago and quickly subscribed for a two year course to become a Front End Developer. Now I've built several projects going from static websites to API driven applications for small businesses.
Currently I work for a piano manufacturer and I am responsible for the Limburg province what sales, marketing and public relations are concerned. I also organize the concerts in our concert hall.
